title: Navigating the Train Station Service Desk

content.text: You are at the NS (Dutch Railways) service desk at Utrecht Centraal. You need to buy a public transport card but are confused by the options.

content.title: The Core Request
content.setting: You approach the NS service desk. The clerk greets you.

conversation_flow.title: Say you would like to buy a public transport card
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Goedemiddag. Waarmee kan ik u helpen?

conversation_flow.title: Ask if you need a personal or an anonymous card
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Natuurlijk. Wilt u een persoonlijke of een anonieme kaart?

data.meaning: What does the anonymous card cost?

content.title: Information Gathering
content.setting: The conversation continues. The clerk needs more information to help you.

conversation_flow.title: Say you are a tourist and you are staying for one month
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Dat hangt ervan af. Bent u een inwoner?

conversation_flow.title: Ask for the price of the anonymous card
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oké, dan is een anonieme kaart het beste voor u.

content.title: The Bureaucratic Hurdle
content.setting: You've decided on the anonymous card, but there's a small problem.

conversation_flow.title: Say you want to buy the anonymous card now
React with 'Oh, okay.'
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Helaas, die verkopen wij alleen bij de automaat.

data.phrase: Kan ik hier met contant geld betalen?
data.meaning: Can I pay here with cash?

content.title: Solving the Machine Issue
content.setting: You went to the ticket machine, but your card was declined. You return to the service desk.

conversation_flow.title: Say the machine does not accept your foreign credit card
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Bent u er weer? Is er een probleem?

conversation_flow.title: Ask if you can pay with cash here
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ah, dat is een bekend probleem. Ik kan een uitzondering maken.

content.title: Resolution
content.setting: The clerk has agreed to sell you the card directly. Now you need to finalize the transaction.

conversation_flow.title: Confirm the total is 27.50 euros
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ja, dat kan. De kaart is 7,50 euro. Hoeveel tegoed wilt u erop zetten? Ik raad 20 euro aan.
